machine_number.title: Machine Serial Number
machine_number.description: This field is used for Machinery Finder App to store machine serial number in a ticket.

machine_AE.title: Machine Account Manager
machine_AE.description: This field is used for Machinery Finder App to store case Company's Account Manager in a ticket.

machine_service_contract.title: Machine Service Contract
machine_service_contract.description: This field is used for Machinery Finder App to store case Company's Account Manager in a ticket.

serial_number.description: The serial number of the machine.
serial_number.title: Serial Number

registration_number.description: The registration number of the machine
registration_number.title: Registration Number

model.description: The machine's model (for example: plane, engine, etc.).
model.title: Model

primary_account_manager.description: The primary account manager, representing the company and responsible for the machine.
primary_account_manager.title: Primary Account Manager

contract_type.description: The contract type used for the machine.
contract_type.title: Contract Type
